name: 李俊賢
objective: Teaching Topics: Discrete-time systems and the z-transform, sampling and reconstruction, open-loop discrete-time systems, closed-loop systems, system time-response characteristics, stability analysis techniques, and digital controller design
schedule:
Week 1-2: Introduction
Week 3-4: Discrete-time systems and the z-transform
Week 5-6: Sampling and reconstruction
Week 7-8: Open-loop discrete-time systems
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10-11: Closed-loop systems
Week 12-13: System time-response characteristics
Week 14-15: Stability analysis techniques
Week 16-17: Digital controller design
Week 18: Final Exam
scorePolicy: Grading: Labs: 40%, Quizzes: 10%, Midterm: 20%, Final: 20%, Participation: 10%
materials: Textbook: C. L. Phillips, H. T. Nagle, and A. Chakrabortty, Digital Control Systems: Analysis & Design, 4/e, Pearson Education, 2015 (滄海圖書代理).
